title: Social Domain E-Learning Design Utilizing Adaptive Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and intermediate knowledge in social studies
context.additional_context: Enhancing learner motivation and engagement by combining VR simulations with adaptive gamification in a smartphone-centric, limited technological environment.

learning_goals: Learners can perform social problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy in a gamified VR simulation environment.
Learners adjust their learning behaviors by more than 70% based on adaptive feedback (scores/badges/levels) provided by the system.
Learners can develop self-directed learning plans utilizing gamification elements (challenge tasks, leaderboards, etc.) upon course completion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
